About Rotati

  • Home /
  • About Us

Discover Rotati

Rotati is a Web and Mobile consultancy firm. We craft solutions for startups, entrepreneurs and agencies. We are dedicated teams who turn your ideas into working software and we work tirelessly with real passion.

Technologies we Love

Ruby
Rails
JavaScript
AngularJS

Meet the Team

Darren Jensen

Software Developer, entrepreneur and software programming teacher, Darren is the founder of Rotati. Darren has more than 12 years of professional Software Developer experience and has been involved in several startups too!

Channa

Superb customer service and support manager - Channa has years of experience making sure that the customer is kept well in the loop

 

Why Choose Us?

When you hire us, you'll work directly with our project manager and team of developers and designers who are passionate about building products that people love. We understand that the details matter and we take the time to understand you and your business. Our carefully chosen tools and refined processes ensure that your project progresses smoothly and launches successfully. Through iterative development, continuously tested deployments and a tight customer feedback loop, no time is wasted.

Our Services

Mobile Apps
We make professional Mobile Apps that can be HTML5 (web browser based) or Hybrid (installed from the app store). We can work with you to determine the best approach for your project.
Web Apps
We make superb Web Apps using Ruby on Rails and Angular JS - both proven and modern technology used by millions of companies.
Data Visualization
We can create beautiful, dynamic data visualizations from any dataset whatever the size. We love to make data beautiful!
API Integration
Need to integrate an app with a 3rd party API? Let Rotati do this for you! We have a ton of experience integration with Google, Yahoo, Amazon and other API providers.
GIS Apps
We have experience of making GIS based applications too. If you need to use geolocation services, address lookup, POI mapping solutions or fully customized mapping solutions then we can help.
